Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies are under significant pressure to win Game 4 to continue their postseason journey.
Phillies' bullpen has struggled, allowing 17 hits and 13 runs in nine innings.
Mets have performed well in games started by Phillies' key pitchers Zack Wheeler and Aaron Nola.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article highlights the historical context of teams facing elimination in similar situations.
The Phillies' legacy and the Mets' momentum are discussed as key factors.
